# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.MMX property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Intel MMX Technology. A value of true indicates the processor supports the Intel MMX technology.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: MMX
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey MMX { get; }
```
